name: Megacubo XML Metafile
summary: Learn about .MEGA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Many different free IPTV channels are included with the Megacubo software installation. Others can be downloaded from the Megacubo website as channel packages (.MCP files), each of which contains multiple MEGA files.
NOTE: Megacubo is localized in Portugese.

description: TV channel data file used by Megacubo, a program used for streaming IPTV (Internet Protocol TV) stations; saves information about the stream, such as the channel name, a description, and the connection URL; allows TV station presets to be saved.
